00019 class ImageFormat_CompProxy: public FileFormat
00020 {
00021 private:
00022     static void gz_compress( std::ifstream &in, gzFile out ) {
00023         char buf[2048 * 1024];
00024         int len;
00025 
00026         for (
00027             in.read( buf, 2048 * 1024 );
00028             ( len = ( int )in.gcount() );
00029             in.read( buf, 2048 * 1024 )
00030         ) {
00031             if ( gzwrite( out, buf, len ) != len ) {
00032                 int err;
00033                 gzerror( out, &err );
00034 
00035                 // If an error occurred in the file system and not in the compression library, err is set to Z_ERRNO
00036                 if ( err == Z_ERRNO ) {
00037                     throwSystemError( errno, "Failed to compress file" );
00038                 } else {
00039                     throwGenericError( "Failed to compress file" );
00040                 }
00041             }
00042         }
00043     }
00044 
00045     static void file_compress( std::string infile, std::string outfile ) {
00046         std::ifstream in;
00047         in.exceptions( std::ifstream::failbit | std::ifstream::badbit );
00048         in.open( infile.c_str(), std::ios::binary );
00049         gzFile out = gzopen( outfile.c_str(), "wb" );
00050 
00051         if ( out == NULL ) {
00052             if ( errno )
00053                 throwSystemError( errno );
00054             else //zlib says, that if errno is zero there was insufficient memory
00055                 throwGenericError( "insufficient memory for compression" );
00056         }
00057 
00058         gz_compress( in, out );
00059 
00060         if ( gzclose( out ) != Z_OK ) {
00061             LOG( ImageIoLog, warning ) << "gzclose " << outfile << " failed";
00062         }
00063     }
00064 
00065     static void gz_uncompress( gzFile in, std::ofstream &out ) {
00066         char buf[2048 * 1024];
00067         int len;
00068         size_t bytes = 0;
00069 
00070         for (
00071             len = gzread( in, buf, 2048 * 1024 );
00072             len;
00073             len = gzread( in, buf, 2048 * 1024 )
00074         ) {
00075             if ( len < 0 ) {
00076                 int err;
00077                 gzerror( out, &err );
00078 
00079                 // If an error occurred in the file system and not in the compression library, err is set to Z_ERRNO
00080                 if ( err == Z_ERRNO ) {
00081                     throwSystemError( errno, "Failed to read compressed file" );
00082                 } else {
00083                     throwGenericError( "Failed to read compressed file" );
00084                 }
00085             } else {
00086                 out.write( buf, len );
00087                 bytes += len;
00088             }
00089         }
00090 
00091         LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Uncompressed " << bytes << " bytes";
00092     }
00093 
00094     static void file_uncompress( std::string infile, std::string outfile ) {
00095         gzFile in = gzopen( infile.c_str(), "rb" );
00096         LOG( Debug, info ) <<  "Uncompressing " << util::MSubject( infile ) << " to "  << util::MSubject( outfile );
00097 
00098         if ( in == NULL ) {
00099             if ( errno )
00100                 throwSystemError( errno );
00101             else //zlib says, that if errno is zero there was insufficient memory
00102                 throwGenericError( "insufficient memory for compression" );
00103         }
00104 
00105         std::ofstream out;
00106         out.exceptions( std::ifstream::failbit | std::ifstream::badbit );
00107         out.open( outfile.c_str(), std::ios::binary );
00108         gz_uncompress( in, out );
00109 
00110         if ( gzclose( in ) != Z_OK ) {
00111             LOG( ImageIoLog, warning ) << "gclose " << outfile << " failed";
00112         }
00113     }

00116     std::string suffixes( io_modes /*modes=both*/ )const {
00117         return std::string( ".gz" );
00118     }
00119 public:
00120     std::string dialects( const std::string &filename )const {
00121         if( filename.empty() ) {
00122             return std::string();
00123         } else {
00124             std::set<std::string> ret;
00125             data::IOFactory::FileFormatList formats = data::IOFactory::getFileFormatList( FileFormat::makeBasename( filename ).first );
00126             BOOST_FOREACH( data::IOFactory::FileFormatList::const_reference ref, formats ) {
00127                 const std::list<std::string> dias = util::stringToList<std::string>( ref->dialects( filename ) );
00128                 ret.insert( dias.begin(), dias.end() );
00129             }
00130             return util::listToString( ret.begin(), ret.end(), " ", "", "" );
00131         }
00132     }
00133     std::string getName()const {return "compression proxy for other formats";}
00134 
00135     virtual std::pair<std::string, std::string> makeBasename( const std::string &filename )const {
00136         const std::pair<std::string, std::string> proxyBase = FileFormat::makeBasename( filename ); // get rid of the the .gz
00137         //then get the actual plugin for the format
00138         const data::IOFactory::FileFormatList formats = data::IOFactory::getFileFormatList( proxyBase.first );
00139 
00140         if( formats.empty() ) {
00141             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Cannot determine the basename of " << util::MSubject( proxyBase.first ) << " because no io-plugin was found for it";
00142             return proxyBase;
00143         }
00144 
00145         //and ask it for the basename
00146         const std::pair<std::string, std::string> realBase = formats.front()->makeBasename( proxyBase.first );
00147         return std::make_pair( realBase.first, realBase.second + proxyBase.second );
00148     }
00149 
00150     int load ( std::list<data::Chunk> &chunks, const std::string &filename, const std::string &dialect ) throw( std::runtime_error & ) {
00151         const std::pair<std::string, std::string> proxyBase = FileFormat::makeBasename( filename ); // get rid of the the .gz
00152         //then get the actual plugin for the format
00153         const data::IOFactory::FileFormatList formats = data::IOFactory::getFileFormatList( proxyBase.first );
00154 
00155         if( formats.empty() ) {
00156             throwGenericError( "Cannot determine the unzipped suffix of \"" + filename + "\" because no io-plugin was found for it" );
00157         }
00158 
00159         const std::pair<std::string, std::string> realBase = formats.front()->makeBasename( proxyBase.first );
00160 
00161         util::TmpFile tmpfile( "", realBase.second );
00162 
00163         file_uncompress( filename, tmpfile.file_string() );
00164 
00165         std::list<data::Chunk>::iterator prev = chunks.end();
00166 
00167         --prev;
00168 
00169         int ret = data::IOFactory::load( chunks, tmpfile.string(), "", dialect );
00170 
00171         if( ret ) {
00172             prev++;
00173             LOG( Debug, info ) <<  "Setting source of all " << std::distance( prev, chunks.end() ) << " chunks to " << util::MSubject( filename );
00174 
00175             for( ; prev != chunks.end(); ++prev ) {
00176                 prev->setPropertyAs( "source", filename );
00177             }
00178         }
00179 
00180         return ret;
00181     }
00182 
00183     void write( const data::Image &/*image*/, const std::string &/*filename*/, const std::string &/*dialect*/ )throw( std::runtime_error & ) {
00184         throw( std::runtime_error( "Compressed write is not yet implemented" ) );
00185     }
00186     bool tainted()const {return false;}//internal plugins are not tainted
